Title: Quartet
Writer: Ronald Harwood (based on the play by), Ronald Harwood (screenplay by)
Actors: Maggie Smith, Tom Courtenay, Billy Connolly, Pauline Collins
Plot: At a home for retired musicians, the annual concert to celebrate Composer Giuseppe Verdi's birthday is disrupted by the arrival of Jean (Dame Maggie Smith), an eternal diva and the former wife of one of the residents.
Awards: Nominated for 1 Golden Globe. Another 4 wins & 4 nominations.
